assessGPR4(List<Event>) - Method in class GTTM_Analyser.GroupingStructureAnalyser
Provides an assessment of a list of Event objects, containing exactly four AttackEvent objects (n1, n2, n3, and n4) according to the rules of GPR4, which provides a rating based on how well n2 rates according to GPR2 and GPR3, giving preference to GPR2.
assessGroupingWellformedness(List<Group>) - Method in class Grammar_Elements.WellFormednessAnalyser
Assesses whether the list of groups fit the GWFRs constraints.
assessHarmonicRelationA(AttackEvent, AttackEvent) - Method in class GTTM_Analyser.ProlongationalReductionAnalyser
Assesses the harmonic stability of a given child AttackEvent in relation to the given parent AttackEvent according to the rule that 'a connection between two events is harmonically more stable if their roots are closer on the circle of fifths'.
assessHarmonicRelationB(AttackEvent, AttackEvent, boolean) - Method in class GTTM_Analyser.ProlongationalReductionAnalyser
Assesses the harmonic stability of a given child AttackEvent in relation to the given parent AttackEvent according to the rule that 'a progression that ascends along the circle of fifths is most stable as a right-branching structure; one that descends along the circle of fifths is more stable as a left branching structure'.
assessMelodicStabilityA(AttackEvent, AttackEvent) - Method in class GTTM_Analyser.ProlongationalReductionAnalyser
